metadata.name: Metropolis #1 | Square Victoria
metadata.description:
Square Victoria was where I would get off to work every morning of the week, of course it also was the first subway station on my way back. The end and a new beginning. The entrance is located at the heart of the city financial disctrict.

---

Metropolis is a play on the word "metro(subway)" and "polis" which means "city" in greek.

Each of the 6 pieces collection is associated to a subway station from the "Société des Transports de Montréal".

Why these six?

It's simply because it's the 6 station I used the most when I was working in downtown Montréal, about 15 years ago.

The top down view suggest an "Heat Map" of the city at those key locations.

Everything is made using Javascript and P5.js.

32x22 inches
9600 x 6600px
